Name of Agency to Which this Form Applie: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Additional Scope Comments: CDC is a component of the Department of Health and Human Services.  CDC is maintaining the emails of the CDC Director and all agency executives.  The emails will be transferred to the National Archives fifteen years after the end of the employee tenure.
Legacy Email Scope: CDC will be including legacy emails dating back to October 2014, that were retained by each executive in their email account.
URL to Agency Organization Chart: sent pdf of CDC/ATSDR organizational chart
